name: Christmas Stories: Hans Christian Andersen's Tin Soldier Collector's Edition
description: The Rat King's wand has fallen into the hands of a vengeful baron. Team up with your new friend, the Tin Soldier, to stop him!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 2.5 GHZ Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1515 MB available space
